name: Igloo'scapade
description:
Igloo'scapade is a game made for the Kindred Community Game Jam. It was created as a coop platformer but it can also be played as a single player.

Your goal is to get to the Igloo for the party.

This is the first game I make so any feedback is very welcome.

[Controls]

WASD & Space - Player 1 // ZQSD also works

Arrows & Right Ctrl - Player 2

M - Muting the music

P - Pausing the game

R - Restart level

[Modes]

1P - 1 Player with Tutorial Levels

2P - 2 Players with Tutorial Levels

1P Skip - 1 Player Generated Levels

2P Skip - 2 Players Generated Levels
